title: James A Garfield National Historic Site: Photos & Multimedia
body: Photos & Multimedia         Firing drill conducted by the 7th & 8th US, and the 2nd Virginia and 5th. Civil War Encampent July-August 2010, James A. Garfield NHS NPS staff  View a panorama of the Garfield House provided by HistoryBuff.com, a nonprofit organization. Images from our first encampment held to commemmorate the Civil War service of General James A. Garfield. The attached photo shows a bayonet drill demonstrated by the 5th Texas. Keep checking back for information about the 2011 encampment
